creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: each panel framed in gilt; four panels at left have connected, looping calligraphy with three columns per panel; red seal in URC of third panel from right; second panel from right has two very large characters and a short line of small characters at left edge, with two red seals below; rightmost panel has two very large characters and red seal in URC
title: The Old Drunkard's Pavillion
